name: Tong Zhang
body:
### Welcome to TongZhang's Homepage.

Born and raised in Yantai, Shandong, China, I am a first year graduate student at University of Southern California in Los Angeles, CA. I am currently pursuing my master degree in Computer Science.

You can learn more about me via 

[![My Linkedin Profile](https://github.com/TongZhangUSC/TongZhangUSC.github.io/blob/master/images/linkedin.jpg "title")](https://www.linkedin.com/in/tongzhang1994) and 
[![My Resume](https://github.com/TongZhangUSC/TongZhangUSC.github.io/blob/master/images/resume.jpg "title")](https://tongzhangusc.github.io/resume.html)

Hope you enjoy my homepage!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
